attributes.action:
I want mental health lessons in school 
To help stop bullying and abuse ..
attributes.additional_details: Put in place in every singal primary and secondary school to Educated kids about mental health, abuse, and help
attributes.background:
I want kids to be taught about mental health as a lesson 
To be shown examples stories of bullying 
Real life.
What morals and values are 
What words like kindness, compassion & empathy mean.
Help educated young onse about life lessons.

rejection.details:
Mental health and wellbeing is already part of the statutory curriculum:

https://assets.publishing.service.gov.uk/government/uploads/system/uploads/attachment_data/file/1019542/Relationships_Education__Relationships_and_Sex_Education__RSE__and_Health_Education.pdf
